point detector - histogram energies
c ---------- cell card ----------
1 0  -1 imp:n=1
2 0   1 imp:n=0

c ---------- surface card ----------
1 so  200

c ---------- data card ----------
mode n
f5:n 50 0 0 10   $ (x,y,z) si raza punctului
fc5  mrem/h per n/s
c H*(10) neutron flux-to-dose rate conversion factors
